resources.string: Unknown error: are sure the app is installed?
A reminder to check your filtered notification at your desired time.
You have filtered notifications you haven\'t checked
Tap to set a new time
Notify me to check filtered notifications daily
Looks like you are stuck in an infinite scrolling.
One of the ways apps compete for your time and attention is through colors, using grayscale Farhan can disable colors for selected apps when you lunch them eliminating their effect on you!
This service is required for functionalities like infinite scroll blocker or screen grayscale to work
Farhan needs usage access to display your usage information
Appear on top permission is not granted :(
Farhan needs Appear on top access to help you break Infinite scrolling
Farhan needs accessibility service to be able to:

Infinite scrolling is a technique used by apps to keep giving you new content no matter how much you scroll thus reducing your control over your time, Farhan can try to detect when you are stuck in an infinite scroll and remind you to get out of that app!

Notifications are like an alarm except that they can distract you at any time without you even knowing when, Farhan can eliminate this distraction by filtering notification so you won\’t be distracted, you can exclude important apps that you want to get notifications from and the rest will get filtered and you can come to the app and see them at any time!
Farhan needs notification access for Notification filter to work
Farhan does not connect to the internet in anyway, in fact it does\'nt even have an internet permission, so your data stays on your phone
Anyone can see how Farhan works by viewing the source code on GitHub
Let your phone work for you, Not the other way around!

Farhan is an open source android project that offers different tools for you to help you lower the effect of apps manipulating strategies that are used to drain your time and attention, so you can use your phone but not the other way around!
Secure settings permission is not granted :(
Farhan needs Secure settings permission to grayscale the screen for you
Looks like your device is rooted!, use the button below if you want to grant the permission with root
Farhan needs accessibility service to be able to:
To Grant this permission you will need a PC, don\'t worry you only have to do it once and it only takes a few minutes
Please select Farhan to set it as your default launcher
Please select the other launcher you want to use
Know if current app is in exceptions list or not
Know How much you scroll and how much items are on screen.
Display a message if we detect infinite scrolling.
Know if current app is in whitelist or not
To improve productivity during work hours switch your phone to silent and keep it out of sight (Ex: in a drawer)
Don\'t want to miss a notification from an app? make sure to exclude that app in notification filter
Use notify me in notifications filter and set a time to be notified to check your filtered notifications daily
When Grayscale is on, only whitelisted apps will be grayscaled
This is a beta version of Farhan, make sure to report any bugs to the developer and take screenshots if possible
You can add exceptions or set a reminder from notification filter settings
Welcome to notifications filter, your filtered notifications will apear here!.
When you choose Agree you will be navigated to accessibility settings in your device.
Can\'t find a browser, link copied to clipboard
Or Grant the permission manually using ADB on your PC, don\'t worry you only have to do it once and it only takes a few minutes
Permission not granted :(, try the manual method.
Please select a valid start and end date.

Are you sure you want to delete %s\'s data from the database and reload it again? This action cannot be undone. \nPlease note that if the data is older than 6 days, Farhan may not be able to retrieve the usage data again.
Select the start and end dates to view an overview of usage within that time period.
When Farhan is fetching usage info in the background
Processing data for %s, for faster loading
Cache usage data to reduce waiting time the next time you view the same day
Automatically fetch usage data in the background after the end of each day
It seems you permanently declined notification permission, You can go to the app settings to grant it.
Farhan needs notification permission to send you notifications.
Usage reports are off, click to enable
Get periodic usage reports based on the cached data (Experimental)
Last week, you used your phone for %dm more.
Last week, you used your phone for %dh more.
Last week, you used your phone for %dh and %dm more.
Last week, you used your phone for %dm less.
Last week, you used your phone for %dh less.
Last week, you used your phone for %dh and %dm less.
Last week, you used your phone for the same amount of time.
Last month, you used your phone for %dm more.
Last month, you used your phone for %dh more.
Last month, you used your phone for %dh and %dm more.
Last month, you used your phone for %dm less.
Last month, you used your phone for %dh less.
Last month, you used your phone for %dh and %dm less.
Last month, you used your phone for the same amount of time.
Main switch disabled. Please turn on the main switch.
Tap to pause all Farhan features
Tap to resume all Farhan features
You can change this later from the main screen menu
Uses your wallpaper to generate dynamic colors
A Vibrant touch to classic colors
Please enable reminders permission in the next page to allow Farhan to send you a reminder at your selected time
Farhan is missing some permissions for Notify me to work properly
Prevent dismissing the warning dialog for a few seconds after scrolling limit is reached
Select a message to show after scrolling limit is reached.
Hey there! Feeling good about taking a break?
Time flies! You\'ve reached your limit. Ready to switch gears?
Time for a breather! How about giving your eyes and mind a rest?
Beep boop! Time\'s up. Don\'t worry, your phone will be here when you\'re ready to come back.
You\'ve reached your time. Want to take a break, or keep going for a bit longer?
You\'ve been infinitely scrolling for a while. Maybe it\'s a good moment to stretch your legs or grab a snack?
Still having fun? Just checking in!
Remember to take breaks every now and then. Your well-being matters!
Select a message to show when limit is reached and press Save.\n or select Random message to show a random message every time.
Add or delete messages from the list.

Turning on the notification filter means most apps won't be able to send you notifications directly. You'll need to open Farhan to see what you've missed.

Don't worry, you can add important apps (like messaging or alarms) to the exceptions list so you don't miss anything crucial.

Want a daily reminder to check your filtered notifications? You can do that with Notify me!
Hello there! Welcome to the notification filter settings.\nLet me take you on a quick tour Tap anywhere to continue.
This is the filter switch, when the switch is on notifications will be filtered
You can open the exceptions from here and add apps that you don\'t want to filter notifications for
Say you want to have a notification when receive a new message on Signal app
You can open Exception, find the Signal app from the list and turn on the switch next to it and that\'s it!
Its good that you won\'t be distracted by notifications throughout the day, but sometimes you can forget to check Farhan to see what notifications you had for days! 🙁
Don\'t worry 😀 you can setup Notify me from here!, when turned on you will be notified at a time you set to come check your notifications
Ignore Farhan when doing usage calculations
Ignore launcher apps (Ex: Home screen app) when doing usage calculations
How much time would you like to spend on %s?
Looks like you updated an older version!

We’ve made some updates to improve Farhan! To make sure everything works smoothly, we need to move your data to a new system. This may take a few minutes, and you won’t be able to use Farhan during this time. Please keep the app open until the process is finished.
Know when and what app you launch
You attempted to launch %s app %d times within the last 24 hours
Choose a message to show during the delay
